column5: Fantastic!!
Thanks Marc, one day perhaps I will get a chance to come out your way and get a lesson from the master !
Just thought I would share some memories in the moments of my life    what a Journey
Excellent vid Marc. Lots of friends in there too! Thanks for sharing some of your memories.
Great video Marc!!....you truely are the "Muskie Master" and a great sportsman   ......I only dream of catching a small fraction of the Muskies you have caught!  Thanks for sharing..  Steve P
Tks Roy My life is truly a Journey of wonderful moments You being part of it with many others  A Release message shot through the lens of a camera    Treat Big Evil with care
Steve I dont catch any,What I catch is the memories Tks for the kind words ,glad you appreciated moments in my life
Cool vids Marc. But... how am I going to go fish smallies now after seeing all that muskie porn?
Thanks for sharing Marc. Lots of very familiar faces. The time spent with you last year was truly memorable, we are aiming to come back next fall for a couple of more days on the water with you.

Wicked video Mr. Thorpe! Your one dude I would love to fish with at some point in my life. I noticed Krupa in there but not his buddy Ari Vineberg? I fished with Ari last year and I know hes a muskie nut too! Great fish and memories Marc!    TDunn
Marc, you do your job well.  Thanks for sharing with us.
Thanks Marc !! A couple of real circus clowns in your "memories"... right around the 3:33 mark !
Wow what a truly fantastic video.  Thank you for sharing & letting us view the great moments in your life. Great friends, family & awesome fishing  what more could you ask for LoL
thanks Marc-its not often that Joe Public gets a glimpse of your accomplishments
Awesome vids! That double header in the 2nd vid was unreal. Id like to get just 1 like that let alone 2 at the same time. WOW
The only word i can come up with is SPECTACULAR !! Thanks for the trip down your memory lane.  Paul

Having just seen you in action first hand not long ago, I can fully appreciate the whole video now.  Really put together well Marc, the words in the song corresponded perfectly with what was happening in the vid  Joey
Great video!!!! Thanks for sharing!!  I really want to go musky fishing now lol!!!
Was worth the wait to watch and listen. Super vid and song was a perfect fit for it.  Thanks for sharing.  Loved the tail walk shot. Perfect.
Me thinks I spotted a few familiar faces. Awesome video Marc!!

Tks  Wayne the Fitting song for that moment is "Basket Case" by Green Day  Darren ,for some of us ,we still get to experience those memories,for others its no longer physically possible. In hopes those not able, enjoyed the "moments" captured through the lens and shared go far beyond any fish  Joey the most fitting line " The screaming filled my head all day"  Many songs are fitting for the moment and others tell the story of those moments  The fish like many will be forgotten ,but the memories will be engraved in Time  Tks glad you enjoyed

That is one memory that is truly etched in my brain. Three days with Marc was an unforgetable experience.  You have what every Muskie Nut could only dream about Marc and you do it so well.  Do you know how many "special coloured" bucktails I have made since then? None of them have accomplished the same thing as that day.  Be well my friend.  Tom.

From where I sit it would seem you live a charmed life Marc but I know it's not all roses. But you do have the memories of great fish and great company and I'm pleased you shared those moments, great videos. Thanks.
Reason number 127 why I want to catch up to Marc someday.... Thanks for the trip and the other things you have done behind the scenes here at OFC.  Art
Amazing videos!  Thanks for sharing Marc!
one of my favourite songs.
